TopicTitle: Rhyunix's KSP Artwork - Current Work: Full Throttle- Accepting requests!

Articles.Content: Is that one mine? If so it has 3 side tanks on each side, the outermost with the nukes.

That is yours- thank you for that

Need to make some adjustments...

More work on the spaceplane, added colour, Jool, details- its a wholesale!

But not finished
It looks like it's swimming in Jools oceons. But it dosen't have.

It looks like it's swimming in Jools oceons. But it dosen't have.

Don't quite get the English there but since the planet is gas and the same colour nearly all the way through, it will look like that as the horizon and atmosphere mix
I mean, I know that, but it looks like it's swimming instead of flying.
Its gonna get some things that will make it look like its flying, in time

Few things, first can you make it pitching up a bit like the Shuttle would?

Also, this on is kinda small, but one front of the 3 tanks on the sides are Ram Intakes... uh, the ones with the blue lights, right?

Oh ok!

Can't make it pitch up, but will adjust intakes
I've made the finishing touches and so I call it complete- There are some details that I simply couldn't achieve but here it is!:
Hmph. You haven't forgotten me, have you?

No! I'm just going through requests

Since I'm verging on despair (and cause its my thread so I can ) please check out my Youtube channel "http://www.youtube.com/user/SuperRhyunixGaming"

Low blow I know- I might record me making one of these sometime...

Edited December 26, 2013 by Rhyunix
Could I have a couple more pictures of your craft Sesni, the way I've drawn it, the symmetric doesn't look right

Conquering Minmus:

My work so far on the Minmus lander

Conquering Minmus

The finished piece:

Sorry, I hadn't checked back. Would have liked it with the center at a different angle, but I'll have it! Good as usual.

EDIT : I had that craft requested, and the tech list I gave him was out of date, and so I had to fix it in a sandbox save and forgot a leg or two, only noticed when I was in like minmus transit or something.

This is the best I could do with the angle change- I simply can't change the lander's angle

Dude,I love your style,it's so simple and amazing!

and,just in case you have some free time,here are some things that may fire your imagination

Meet the duna ion rover

and also,a simple space station,that is just right about to explode! EXPLOOOSIOOOONS

I also forgot to take a photo with extended panels.Though I can't now,the station is gone :/

Haven't come here for a while, struck this up on my current work

Nice art mate looks really good. You've got talent that I wished I had. I was wondering if you had seen the movie Space Cowboys. I've always loved the last shot of that movie where the astronaut is sitting looking up at Earth with his rocket around him. It would be awesome if you could that. (My god I sound like a fanboy)
There's no real fancy work put into this- just me, paint.NET and my mouse, possibly some music I guess; Thank you anyway

Would really like to see this done in your EPIC style

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57484-Real-Spacecraft-Project-%28Soyuz-ISS-and-others%29?p=814529&viewfull=1#post814529

DISCLAIMER: THIS IS NOT MY CRAFT, I'm just recommending this

I've always loved the last shot of that movie where the astronaut is sitting looking up at Earth with his rocket around him. It would be awesome if you could that. (My god I sound like a fanboy)
